Description:
You arrive at a watchtower, this tower was the first point of defense in the Wolf Wars against the wild werewolves of the forest.

As you approach the tower entrance, the tower begins to collapse.
DescriptionAction: The debris begins to fall and you must act quickly to avoid damage.
